Database Management System (DBMS).text: Write down the output of the given program. Show with dry run in table. DECLARE SUB PATTERN(S$) CLS B$="PROGRAM" CALL PATTERN(B$) END SUB PATTERN(S$) H=LEN(S$) I=10 FOR J=1 TO H STEP 2 PRINT TAB(I); MID$(S$,J,H) H=H-2 I=I+1 NEXT J END SUB
